title: Motorola Moto X Play price, specifications and features
text: Motorola Moto X Play price, specifications and features Monday, 14 September 2015 (13 minutes ago) Moments ago, Motorola launched the Moto X Play at an event in New Delhi. The smartphone’s price starts from Rs 18,499, and it will go on sale exclusively via Flipkart at midnight. Let’s take a closer look at the specifications and features of Motorola’s latest flagship smartphone. Motorola Moto X Play price: The Moto X Play is priced at Rs 18,499 for the 16GB variant, and Rs 19,999 for the 32GB variant. As with all Motorola smartphones on sale in India, this new smartphone too will be exclusively available on Flipkart. The Moto X Play will go on sale at midnight. Motorola Moto X Play specifications and features: The talking point of the Moto X Play is its massive 3,630mAh As BGR India had earlier reported, Motorola has today launched the Moto X Play in India.
